entry.title: Thomas on Subregular Tree Transductions (Nov 5)
entry.content: Hello everyone! Tomorrow we will be meeting and Thomas will be talking about Subregular Tree Transductions.

entry.title: No meeting this Friday (October 1)
entry.content: Since we have our first colloquium talk of the semester scheduled this Friday (October 1), we will not be meeting this week.

entry.title: First Meeting Tomorrow at 2:15pm
entry.summary: As previously announced by Vinny, we'll have our first meeting tomorrow, September 17, at 2:15pm in the Department Seminar Room. Keep in mind that this semester we're running MLRG as the Mathematical Linguistics Recreation Group, so bring food and drinks and be ready for a relaxed time of witty â€¦
entry.content: As previously announced by Vinny, we'll have our first meeting tomorrow, September 17, at 2:15pm in the Department Seminar Room. Keep in mind that this semester we're running MLRG as the Mathematical Linguistics Recreation Group, so bring food and drinks and be ready for a relaxed time of witty banter.

entry.title: Kalina on the Subregular Complexity of Persistent Features
entry.content: Today Kalina will be talking about how persistent features might affect the complexity of the basic operations in MG syntax. Hope to see you all there!
